parameters: I thought we had a deal! Fix the displays and I won't hold you hostage.
Keep this in an autorun so there's always something on
the shelves even when you're not in the minigame.
Otherwise the shelves will be empty.
You can also put this in each interactable event for
less overhead. (Parallel process is not really a good
way of doing it, but I needed a way to constantly test
and changing each event every time was not very
Everything is in its rightful place.
Do you want to put the \v[815] here?
